floating-island.name: Floating Island
floating-island.description: Start your galactic empire with this floating island and small oasis. Build it up and share it with your friends.

low-poly-floating-island.name: Low-poly Floating Island
low-poly-floating-island.description: Impressionism with polygons. If you want your virtual island to be nothing but a beautiful painting, this is the aesthetic for you.

mid-century-modern-living-room.name: Mid-century Modern Living Room
mid-century-modern-living-room.description: Timeless, mid-century modern beauty. Notice the classic Eames Recliner and the beautiful built-in shelving.

bar.name: The Bar
bar.description: A sexy club scene to plan your parties and live shows.

space.name: Space
space.description: Vast, empty, nothingness. A completely clean slate for you to start building anything you desire.
